function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased rates of common mental disorders (CMD) and psychological distress during lockdown.","Impact":"Negative impact on mental health of the population.","Mitigation":"Improving access to mental health support, promoting social connectedness, and reducing isolation.","Technologies":"Telehealth, mental health apps, virtual support groups.","People":"General population, women of all ages, young adults.","Owner":"Healthcare providers, community organizations, government."},{"Description":"Pronounced social gradient in the mental health consequences of lockdowns.","Impact":"Unequal distribution of mental health consequences, with disadvantaged groups at higher risk.","Mitigation":"Addressing social determinants of health, providing targeted support for vulnerable populations, and promoting equity in access to mental health services.","Technologies":"Data analytics for identifying vulnerable populations, telemedicine for remote support.","People":"Disadvantaged groups, marginalized communities, low-income individuals.","Owner":"Social services, public health agencies, non-profit organizations."},{"Description":"Increase in generalised anxiety disorders and depressive symptoms during lockdowns.","Impact":"Negative impact on mental well-being and quality of life.","Mitigation":"Promoting mental health education and awareness, increasing access to mental health resources, and providing support for coping strategies.","Technologies":"Online mental health resources, AI chatbots for mental health support, teletherapy services.","People":"General population, individuals with pre-existing mental health conditions.","Owner":"Educational institutions, mental health organizations, employers."}]}
